page.title: 02STANWAY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The environment in our school area has changed a great deal.All the farmland has been sold and new houses built on the land.The new houses have smaller gardens than the old ones, with walls surrounding them.Birdlife has changed since all the{hedgerows} went.Foxes are still seen but have to travel further to find prey. Much of the life of the village is centred round the{schools}the other main centre is Villa Road where we have the{village hall},in which the {Playgroup},{the baby clinic}and various organisations meet, the {commuinity centre}(which is new and not often used at the moment).{The {library}and the {Scout Headquarters} are important.
